languages.text: У вас на корабле есть запас металлолома — всевозможных запчастей и материалов для ремонта. {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Металлолом{/g} расходуется на ремонт судна после боя, на улучшение системных компонентов и для адаптации корабельных постов под спутников.

Your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} carries a stockpile of {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} after a battle, improving system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g}, or adapting the ship's posts.
languages.original_text: У вас на корабле есть запас металлолома — всевозможных запчастей и материалов для ремонта. {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Металлолом{/g} расходуется на ремонт судна после боя, на улучшение системных компонентов и для адаптации корабельных постов под спутников.

traits.locale_text: Your flagship carries a stockpile of scrap — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's hull integrity after a battle, improving system components, or adapting the ship's posts for your companions.

Your flagship carries a stockpile of scrap — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's hull integrity after a battle, improving system components, or adapting the ship's posts for your companions.

Your flagship carries a stockpile of scrap — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's hull integrity after a battle, improving system components, or adapting the ship's posts.

Your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} carries a stockpile of {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} after a battle, improving system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g}, or adapting the ship's posts.

languages.text: Dein {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} führt einen Vorrat an{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g} mit sich — Ersatzteile und Materialien, die für Reparaturen verwendet werden können. Schrott kann zur Reparatur der {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} deines Schiffes nach einem Kampf, zur Verbesserung von {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}Systemkomponenten{/g} oder zur Anpassung der Schiffsposten verbraucht werden.
languages.original_text: Your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} carries a stockpile of {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} after a battle, improving system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g}, or adapting the ship's posts.

traits.locale_text: Dein {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} führt einen Vorrat an{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}Schrott{/g} mit sich — Ersatzteile und Materialien, die für Reparaturen verwendet werden können. Schrott kann zur Reparatur der {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpfintegrität{/g} deines Schiffes nach einem Kampf, zur Verbesserung von Systemkomponenten oder zur Anpassung der Schiffsposten verbraucht werden.

languages.text: Votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} dispose d'un stock de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g}, à savoir des pièces détachées et des matériaux qui peuvent être utilisés à des fins de réparations. Les pièces de récupération permettent de réparer l'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de la coque{/g} de votre vaisseau après un combat, d'améliorer les {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}composants{/g} système ou d'adapter les postes du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} carries a stockpile of {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} after a battle, improving system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g}, or adapting the ship's posts.

traits.locale_text: Votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} dispose d'un stock de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}pièces de récupération{/g}, à savoir des pièces détachées et des matériaux qui peuvent être utilisés à des fins de réparations. Les pièces de récupération permettent de réparer l'{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}intégrité de la coque{/g} de votre vaisseau après un combat, d'améliorer les composants système ou d'adapter les postes du vaisseau.

languages.text: 您的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}会携带许多{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}，这些额外的材料与零件可以用来修复旗舰。战斗结束之后，您可以使用废料来修复旗舰的{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}，或是升级系统{g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}组件{/g}，或是调整舰船上的职位。
languages.original_text: Your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} carries a stockpile of {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} after a battle, improving system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g}, or adapting the ship's posts.

traits.locale_text: 您的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}会携带许多{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}废料{/g}，这些额外的材料与零件可以用来修复旗舰。战斗结束之后，您可以使用废料来修复旗舰的{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体完整度{/g}，或是升级系统组件，或是调整舰船上的职位。

languages.text: Tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} transporta una reserva de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g}, es decir, piezas de repuesto y materiales que pueden utilizarse para reparaciones. La chatarra puede invertirse en reparar la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g} de tu nave después de una batalla, mejorar los {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}componentes{/g} de sistema o adaptar los puestos de la nave.
languages.original_text: Your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} carries a stockpile of {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} after a battle, improving system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g}, or adapting the ship's posts.

traits.locale_text: Tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} transporta una reserva de {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}chatarra{/g}, es decir, piezas de repuesto y materiales que pueden utilizarse para reparaciones. La chatarra puede invertirse en reparar la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}integridad de casco{/g} de tu nave después de una batalla, mejorar los componentes de sistema o adaptar los puestos de la nave.

languages.original_text: The player has a stock of scrap metal — all kinds of spare parts and repair materials — on his ship. Scrap metal is used to repair the ship after a battle, to improve system components and to adapt posts to companions.

languages.text: プレイヤーの{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}の備蓄を運んでおり、修繕用のスペア部品や材料として使用できる。スクラップは戦闘後の{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}の修繕や{g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}システム改善{/g}、または船のポストの適合化等に使用できる。
languages.original_text: Your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} carries a stockpile of {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g} — spare parts and materials that can be used for repairs. Scrap can be spent on repairing your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull integrity{/g} after a battle, improving system {g|Encyclopedia:ShipComponentsGlossary}components{/g}, or adapting the ship's posts.

traits.locale_text: プレイヤーの{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}スクラップ{/g}の備蓄を積んでおり、修繕用のスペア部品や材料として使用できる。スクラップは戦闘後の{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体の完全性{/g}の修繕やシステム改善、または船のポストの適合化等に使用できる。
